name: frensHouse DAO
description: Complete these tasks to start your frensHouse Journey! 🏴🚀

tasks.name: 🔑 Create a Web3 wallet
tasks.description: Visit https://ethereum.org/wallets and install a wallet to start your Bankless journey.

tasks.name: 🏴 OG frensHouse Member
tasks.description: frensHouse https://newsletter.banklesshq.com subscribers who own a Bankless POAP from 2020 or 2021.

tasks.name: 🌐 Join Bankless DAO and vote on Snapshot
tasks.description: Participate in (off-chain) governance using Snapshot and vote on min. 1 proposal.

tasks.name: 📚 Bankless Learner
tasks.description: Complete lessons on Bankless Academy https://banklessacademy.com and collect POAPs as Proof of Learning.

tasks.name: ✌️ Own a DAO Punk
tasks.description: Liberate yourself from corporation and join a DAO! For all DAO Punk NFT https://opensea.io/collection/daopunksnft owners.

tasks.name: 🗺 Own a Bankless Location
tasks.description: Own a Bankless Location NFT https://rarible.com/banklesslocations to own a piece of DAO culture.

tasks.name: 🎙 Listen to Crypto Sapiens
tasks.description: Join Crypto Sapiens https://linktr.ee/CryptoSapiensOfficial live events and receive a listener POAP.
